ValidationRule.description: Medical Facility or Doctor Must be Entered
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Name_of_Medical_Facility__c ), ISBLANK( Performing_Physician_Name_First_Last__c ), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Wellness" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: CL-010 Either the Medical Facility or Physician Must be Entered
